ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This will be their hospitality on the Day of Judgment!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Such will be their welcome on the Day of Judgement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus shall they be entertained on the Day of Recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Such will be their dwelling on the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is their reception on the Day of Justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That will be their entertainment on the Day of Recompense!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is their entertainment on the day of requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This shall be their hospitality on the Day of Doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This will be their welcome on the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This shall be their entertainment on the Day of Judgement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This shall be their entertainment on the Day of Requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Such will be the hospitality they receive on the Day of Retribution.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such will be their entertainment on the Day of Requital!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That will be their entertainment on the Day of Recompense!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Such shall be your hospitality on the Day of Recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That is their hospitality on the Day of Retribution.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:56] This will be the hospitality for them, what has been prepared for them, on the Day of Judgement, the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This will be their welcome) this will be their food and drink (on the Day of Judgement) on the Day of Reckoning.
